rules.natural: If the researcher observes the animal, then the researcher achieves the breakthrough.
Either the researcher observes the animal or the researcher uses the tool.
Provided that the researcher verifies the results, the researcher publishes the findings or the researcher replicates the experiment.
Whenever the researcher collaborates with the team, the researcher wins the grant.
Under the condition that the researcher presents at the conference, the researcher achieves the breakthrough.
If the researcher mentors the student, then either the researcher collaborates with the team or the researcher presents at the conference.
Provided that the researcher supervises the project, the researcher collaborates with the team or the researcher presents at the conference.
Whenever the researcher directs the lab, the researcher mentors the student or the researcher supervises the project.
The researcher directs the lab or the researcher chairs the department.
Under the condition that the researcher chairs the department, the researcher mentors the student or the researcher supervises the project.
If the researcher continues the research, then in case the researcher does not achieve the breakthrough, the researcher retires.
The researcher continues the research or the researcher transitions to the field.
If the researcher innovates the technique, then in the event that the researcher excels in the field, the researcher succeeds in the career.
Either the researcher innovates the technique or the researcher develops the theory.
Under the condition that the researcher develops the theory, if the researcher excels in the field, then the researcher succeeds in the career.
Provided that the researcher persists in the investigation, the researcher collaborates with the team or the researcher presents at the conference.
If the researcher studies the phenomenon, then in case the researcher uses the tool, the researcher achieves the breakthrough.
Provided that the researcher succeeds in the discovery, it is not the case that the researcher fails the experiment.
Whenever the researcher publishes the findings, the researcher analyzes the data.
Under the condition that the researcher replicates the experiment, if the researcher does not study the phenomenon, then the researcher documents the phenomenon.
If the researcher tests the hypothesis, then the researcher applies the method.
The researcher tests the hypothesis or the researcher verifies the results.

Provided that it is not true that if the researcher transitions to the field, then if the researcher does not achieve the breakthrough, the researcher retires, then the researcher excels in the field.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(-(abandons(researcher, study) | (collaborates(researcher, team) | presents(researcher, conference))) -> regrets(researcher, decision)) -> reverses(researcher, decision))
rules.natural: If it is not the case that if it is not true that the researcher abandons the study or the researcher collaborates with the team or the researcher presents at the conference, then the researcher regrets the decision, then the researcher reverses the decision.

rules.natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that if it is not true that the researcher abandons the study or the researcher collaborates with the team or the researcher presents at the conference, then the researcher regrets the decision, it is not the case that the researcher reverses the decision.
Provided that the researcher does not persist in the investigation, the researcher fails the experiment.
If the researcher does not persist in the investigation, then the researcher succeeds in the discovery.
Provided that the researcher does not study the phenomenon, it is not the case that the researcher documents the phenomenon.

(A1 → G).natural: If the researcher observes the animal, then the researcher achieves the breakthrough.

(A1 ∨ A2).natural: Either the researcher observes the animal or the researcher uses the tool.

(A10 → (A6 ∨ A7)).natural: Provided that the researcher verifies the results, the researcher publishes the findings or the researcher replicates the experiment.

(A11 ∨ G).natural: The researcher wins the grant or the researcher achieves the breakthrough.

(A12 → A11).natural: Whenever the researcher collaborates with the team, the researcher wins the grant.

(A12 ∨ A13).natural: The researcher collaborates with the team or the researcher presents at the conference.

(A13 → G).natural: Under the condition that the researcher presents at the conference, the researcher achieves the breakthrough.

(A14 → (A12 ∨ A13)).natural: If the researcher mentors the student, then either the researcher collaborates with the team or the researcher presents at the conference.

(A14 ∨ A15).natural: Either the researcher mentors the student or the researcher supervises the project.

(A15 → (A12 ∨ A13)).natural: Provided that the researcher supervises the project, the researcher collaborates with the team or the researcher presents at the conference.

(A16 → (A14 ∨ A15)).natural: Whenever the researcher directs the lab, the researcher mentors the student or the researcher supervises the project.

(A16 ∨ A17).natural: The researcher directs the lab or the researcher chairs the department.

(A17 → (A14 ∨ A15)).natural: Under the condition that the researcher chairs the department, the researcher mentors the student or the researcher supervises the project.

(A19 → (¬G → A18)).natural: If the researcher continues the research, then in case the researcher does not achieve the breakthrough, the researcher retires.

(A19 ∨ A20).natural: The researcher continues the research or the researcher transitions to the field.

(A2 → G).natural: If the researcher uses the tool, then the researcher achieves the breakthrough.

(A20 → (¬G → A18)).natural: Provided that the researcher transitions to the field, it follows that if the researcher does not achieve the breakthrough, the researcher retires.

(A22 → A21).natural: Whenever the researcher excels in the field, the researcher succeeds in the career.

(A23 → (A22 → A21)).natural: If the researcher innovates the technique, then in the event that the researcher excels in the field, the researcher succeeds in the career.

(A23 ∨ A24).natural: Either the researcher innovates the technique or the researcher develops the theory.

(A24 → (A22 → A21)).natural: Under the condition that the researcher develops the theory, if the researcher excels in the field, then the researcher succeeds in the career.

(A25 ∨ (A12 ∨ A13)).natural: The researcher abandons the study or the researcher collaborates with the team or the researcher presents at the conference.

(A28 → (A12 ∨ A13)).natural: Provided that the researcher persists in the investigation, the researcher collaborates with the team or the researcher presents at the conference.

(A3 → (A2 → G)).natural: If the researcher studies the phenomenon, then in case the researcher uses the tool, the researcher achieves the breakthrough.

(A30 → ¬A29).natural: Provided that the researcher succeeds in the discovery, it is not the case that the researcher fails the experiment.

(A5 ∨ (¬A3 → A4)).natural: Either the researcher analyzes the data or if the researcher does not study the phenomenon, then the researcher documents the phenomenon.

(A6 → A5).natural: Whenever the researcher publishes the findings, the researcher analyzes the data.

(A6 ∨ A7).natural: The researcher publishes the findings or the researcher replicates the experiment.

(A7 → (¬A3 → A4)).natural: Under the condition that the researcher replicates the experiment, if the researcher does not study the phenomenon, then the researcher documents the phenomenon.

(A8 ∨ (A6 ∨ A7)).natural: Either the researcher applies the method or the researcher publishes the findings or the researcher replicates the experiment.

(A9 → A8).natural: If the researcher tests the hypothesis, then the researcher applies the method.

(A9 ∨ A10).natural: The researcher tests the hypothesis or the researcher verifies the results.

(¬(A20 → (¬G → A18)) → A21).natural: If it is not the case that if the researcher transitions to the field, then in case the researcher does not achieve the breakthrough, the researcher retires, then the researcher succeeds in the career.

(¬(A20 → (¬G → A18)) → A22).natural: Provided that it is not true that if the researcher transitions to the field, then if the researcher does not achieve the breakthrough, the researcher retires, then the researcher excels in the field.
